languages.text: "Еретики на корабле Помазанни{mf|ка|цы} Императора — угроза всему Империуму. Если кто-то знал об этом и не доложил... последует наказание. Верно, Мастер вокса?"

traits.locale_text: "Преступники на корабле Помазанни{mf|ка|цы} Императора — угроза всему Империуму. Если кто-то знал об этом и не доложил... последует наказание. Верно, вокс-мастер?"

languages.text: "Heretics on board the ship of the Emperor's anointed are a threat to the whole Imperium. If anyone knew of this and failed to report it... punishment will follow. Isn't that right, Vox Master?"
languages.original_text: "Еретики на корабле Помазанни{mf|ка|цы} Императора — угроза всему Империуму. Если кто-то знал об этом и не доложил... последует наказание. Верно, Мастер вокса?"

traits.locale_text: "Heretics on board the ship of the Emperor's Anointed are a threat to the whole Imperium. If anyone knew of this and failed to report it... punishment will follow. Isn't that right, Vox Master?"
"Heretics on board the ship of the Emperor's Anointed are a threat to the whole Imperium. If anyone knew of this and failed to report it... punishment will follow. Isn't that right, Vox Master?"
"Heretics on board the ship of the Emperor's Anointed are a threat to the whole Imperium. If anyone knew of this and failed to report it... punishment will follow. Isn't that right, Vox Master?"
"Heretics on board the ship of the Emperor's anointed are a threat to the whole Imperium. If anyone knew of this and failed to report it... punishment will follow. Isn't that right, Vox Master?"
"Heretics on board the ship of the Emperor's anointed are a threat to the whole Imperium. If anyone knew of this and failed to report it... punishment will follow. Isn't that right, Vox Master?"

languages.text: 「皇帝陛下に選ばれし者の船に異端者が乗っているのは、帝国全体に対する脅威だ。それを知りながら報告しなかった者がいれば…処罰は免れない。そうだな？ヴォクス・マスター」
languages.original_text: "Heretics on board the ship of the Emperor's anointed are a threat to the whole Imperium. If anyone knew of this and failed to report it... punishment will follow. Isn't that right, Vox Master?"

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝陛下に選ばれし者の船に異端者が乗っているのは、帝国全体に対する脅威だ。それを知りながら報告しなかった者がいれば…処罰は免れない。そうだな？ヴォクス・マスター」

languages.text: "İmparator'un kutsadığı bu gemide kâfirlerin yer alması, tüm İmparatorluk için tehlike arz ediyor. Bundan haberdar olup da bildirmeyen varsa... Cezasını çekecektir. Değil mi Voks Üstadı?"
languages.original_text: "Heretics on board the ship of the Emperor's anointed are a threat to the whole Imperium. If anyone knew of this and failed to report it... punishment will follow. Isn't that right, Vox Master?"

traits.locale_text: "İmparator'un kutsadığı bu gemide kâfirlerin yer alması tüm İmparatorluk için bir tehlike arz etmektedir. Eğer bundan haberdar olup da bildirmeyen varsa... Cezasını çekecektir. Öyle değil mi Voks Üstadı?"

languages.text: «La presencia de herejes a bordo de la nave de un{mf||a} ungid{mf|o|a} del Emperador es una amenaza para todo el Imperium. Si alguien supiera de ello y no informara... recibiría un castigo. ¿Verdad, maestra de vocos?».
languages.original_text: "Heretics on board the ship of the Emperor's anointed are a threat to the whole Imperium. If anyone knew of this and failed to report it... punishment will follow. Isn't that right, Vox Master?"

traits.locale_text: «La presencia de herejes a bordo de la nave de un{mf||a} ungid{mf|o|a} del Emperador es una amenaza para todo el Imperium. Si alguien supiera de ello y no informara... recibiría un castigo. ¿Verdad, maestra de vocos?».

languages.text: “帝皇神选者的船上若是混入了异端分子，这会对整个帝国构成威胁。如果有人明明知道这些事情，却没有进行报告……那理当受到惩罚。我说的没错吧，音阵大师？”
languages.original_text: "Heretics on board the ship of the Emperor's anointed are a threat to the whole Imperium. If anyone knew of this and failed to report it... punishment will follow. Isn't that right, Vox Master?"

traits.locale_text: “帝皇神选者的船上若是混入了异端分子，这会对整个帝国构成威胁。如果有人明明知道这些事情，却没有进行报告……那理当受到惩罚。我说的没错吧，音阵大师？”

languages.text: « La présence d'hérétiques à bord du vaisseau de l'{mf|élu|élue} de l'Empereur représente une menace pour l'Imperium tout entier. Quiconque étant informé de cette situation, mais ayant négligé de la signaler... devrait être sanctionné. N'est-ce pas, maîtresse-vox ? »
languages.original_text: "Heretics on board the ship of the Emperor's anointed are a threat to the whole Imperium. If anyone knew of this and failed to report it... punishment will follow. Isn't that right, Vox Master?"

traits.locale_text: « La présence d'hérétiques à bord du vaisseau de l'{mf|élu|élue} de l'Empereur représente une menace pour l'Imperium tout entier. Quiconque étant informé de cette situation, mais ayant négligé de la signaler... devrait être sanctionné. N'est-ce pas, maîtresse-vox ? »

languages.text: "Ketzer auf dem Schiff {mf|des|der} Gesalbten des Imperators sind eine Bedrohung für das gesamte Imperium. Sollte jemand davon gewusst und geschwiegen haben ... wird er bestraft werden. Ist es nicht so, Voxmeisterin?"
languages.original_text: "Heretics on board the ship of the Emperor's anointed are a threat to the whole Imperium. If anyone knew of this and failed to report it... punishment will follow. Isn't that right, Vox Master?"

traits.locale_text: "Ketzer auf dem Schiff {mf|des|der} Gesalbten des Imperators sind eine Bedrohung für das gesamte Imperium. Sollte jemand davon gewusst und geschwiegen haben ... wird er bestraft werden. Ist es nicht so, Voxmeisterin?"
